channel.title: Rsync on The Portal of Knowledge
channel.description: Recent content in Rsync on The Portal of Knowledge

item.title: Reddish write-up
item.description: External enumeration Port scanning Let’s scan the full range of TCP ports using my tool htbscan.py (you can find it here: https://github.com/Alamot/code-snippets/blob/master/enum/htbscan.py). $ sudo htbscan.py 10.10.10.94 100 Running command: sudo masscan -e tun0 -p0-65535 --max-rate 100 --interactive 10.10.10.94 Starting masscan 1.0.4 (http://bit.ly/14GZzcT) at 2018-09-08 16:22:52 GMT -- forced options: -sS -Pn -n --randomize-hosts -v --send-eth Initiating SYN Stealth Scan Scanning 1 hosts [65536 ports/host] Discovered open port 1880/tcp on 10.
